title: Tesla Cuts Prices In China Over Trade War
description: Tesla has announced that it will cut the prices of its Model X and Model S vehicles in China by 12-26% in order to make its cars more affordable. The decision comes months after the firm raised prices by 20% in China in order to compensate for the new tariffs – the decision back then may have been too ambitious so now the firm is willing to take a hit financially in order to boost sales.

title: Brexit Deal Causing Problems For the U.K.
description: A Brexit deal under discussion by European leaders would be worse for the U.K. than remaining in E.U., according to a lawmaker who helped to draft it. Britons voted narrowly to leave the E.U. in a June 2016 referendum, a shock result that plunged the world’s fifth-largest economy into a political crisis.

title: Broncos Have Tough Defensive Matchup Against Steelers
description: Phillip Lindsay and the Broncos will be put to the test against a stout Pittsburgh defense Sunday. The Broncos also have to make sure they are able to stop Antonio Brown and Ben Roethlisberger in order to keep their playoff hopes alive.

title: Samsung Launches First Phone With 4 Rear Cameras
description: Samsung launched its Galaxy A9 (2018) in India. It is priced at Rs 36,990 (6GB RAM) and Rs 39,990 (8GB RAM) and is up for pre-orders. Its highlight is four rear cameras. The setup includes a 24MP, 5MP, 8MP ultra-wide and 10MP telephoto sensors at the back. There’s also a 24MP front-facing camera. Other specs include a 6.3-inch super AMOLED FHD+ display, an octa-core processor, 128GB inbuilt storage and a 3800mAh battery.
